ZFSContainer
public class LibZFS
extends java.lang.Object
implements ZFSContainer

Kohsuke Kawaguchi

create

public <T extends ZFSObject> T create(java.lang.String dataSetName,
                                      java.lang.Class<T> type)
Create a ZFS Data Set of a given name and zfs type.

Parameters:
dataSetName - name of the dataset to create.
type - the zfs type of dataset to create.
Returns:
Never null. Created dataset.

create

public ZFSObject create(java.lang.String dataSetName,
                        ZFSType type,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> props)
Create a ZFS Data Set of a given name, zfs type and properties.

Parameters:
dataSetName - Full name of the dataset to create, like "rpool/abc/def".
type - the zfs type of dataset to create. Either ZFSType.FILESYSTEM or ZFSType.VOLUME.
props - zfs dataset properties. Can be null.
Returns:
created dataset.

open

public ZFSObject open(java.lang.String dataSetName)
Open a ZFS Data Set of a given name.

Parameters:
dataSetName - name of the dataset to open.
Returns:
opened dataset, or null if no such dataset exists.

open

public ZFSObject open(java.lang.String dataSetName,
                      int mask)
Open a ZFS Data Set of a given name and type.

Parameters:
dataSetName - name of the dataset to open.
mask - the zfs type mask of dataset to open.
Returns:
opened dataset, or null if no such dataset exists.

getHandle

public libzfs_handle_t getHandle()
Returns libzfs_handle_t that this object wraps.

If the caller wants to use methods that don't yet have a high-level binding, the returned libzfs_handle_t can be used directly in conjunction with libzfs.LIBZFS.
